Provider Role

CodeDescriptionDeutsch (German)CommentVersion
ad AdmittingAufnehmender ArztPV1-17 Admitting doctoradded v2.4
ai Assistant/Alternate Interpreteralternativer (oder Assistent des) Befundsarztadded v2.6
ap Administering ProviderRXA-10 Administering Provideradded v2.7
at AttendingBehandelnder ArztPV1-7 Attending doctoradded v2.4
clp Collecting ProviderOBR-10 Collector Identifieradded v2.7
cp Consulting ProviderBeratender Arztadded v2.4
dp Dispensing ProviderRXD-10 Dispensing Provideradded v2.7
ep Entering Provider (probably not the same as transcriptionist?)ORC-10 Entered Byadded v2.7
fhcp Family Health Care ProfessionalHausarztadded v2.4
ip Initiating Provider (as in action by)ORC-19 Action Byadded v2.7
mdir Medical DirectorOBX-25 Performing Organization Medical Directoradded v2.7
op Ordering ProviderORC-12 Ordering Provider, OBR-16 Ordering Provider, RXO-14 Ordering Provider's DEA Number, RXE-13 Ordering Provider's DEA Number, ORC-24 Ordering Provider Addressadded v2.7
ph Pharmacist (not sure how to dissect Pharmacist/Treatment Supplier's Verifier ID)RXE-14 Pharmacist/Treatment Supplier's Verifier IDadded v2.7
pi Primary InterpreterVerantwortlicher Übersetzeradded v2.6
pp Primary Care ProviderDurchgangsarztadded v2.4
ro Responsible ObserverOBX-16 Responsible Observeradded v2.7
rp Referring Providerüberweisender/einweisender ArztPV1-8 Referring doctoradded v2.4
rt Referred to ProviderÜberweisungsempfängeradded v2.4
tn TechnicianMTAadded v2.6
tr TranscriptionistSchreibkraftadded v2.6
vp Verifying ProviderORC-11 Verified Byadded v2.7
vps Verifying Pharmaceutical Supplier (not sure how to dissect Pharmacist/Treatment Supplier's Verifier ID)RXE-14 Pharmacist/Treatment Supplier's Verifier IDadded v2.7
